snippet.title: Galaxy of Pen & Paper - Announcement Trailer - "Anyone can be a game master!"
snippet.description:
Galaxy of Pen & Paper is a indie game developed by Behold Studios
(Sequel of Knights of Pen & Paper 1 and 2)

Get it on Steam!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/349790/Galaxy_of_Pen__Paper/

Coming July 27th, 2017
- PC, Mac, Linux, iOS and Android
- Get it on Steam, GOG, Humble Store, App Store, Google Play and others.

Galaxy of Pen & Paper is an RPG with retro art, classic turn-based battles, and an endless parade of monsters, loot, and humor! Assemble your party and control both the players and the Game Master as you fight, loot, and laugh your way to space!

www.galaxyofpenandpaper.com
